BOLD Nebaska

ROLE: HTML, SASS/CSS, Javascript

A political news site but also an organization the creates advocacy campaigns on important issues affecting people living in Nebraska.

Website was designed by Justin Kemerling. I developed the front-end templates while Cody Peterson built the backend using Wordpress.
